how do i start the dev server [WARN] - (starship::modules::custom): Executing custom command "~/.config/ani-os/prompt-scripts/weather.sh" timed out. [WARN] - (starship::modules::custom): You can set c

You need to increase the concurrency. Run:

```bash
pnpm turbo dev --concurrency=15
```

Or for a permanent fix, you can add it to your `turbo.json`. But the quick command above should work.
